name: Farmer Simulator
description:
You have just inherited from your uncle a small farm on the island of Rhodes in ancient Greece, part of the Roman Empire. The year is 113 AD. Build your farm, trade, buy new land and get rich. Become a respected citizen of the island.

Play as you please, you have complete freedom of choice. Will you focus more on growing crops or fishing? Will you raise animals or trade minerals? Buy more land to add to your farm? It's all up to you...


What's in store for you in the game:
- Growing crops
- animal behaviour
- Trade
- pets
- mining resources
- building construction
- buying land
- fishing

... and lots of other fun
